conops.path: /Users/arpithaprakash/Capstone/1-2CR CONOPS&DRAWs - Copy/New folder (29) - Copy/202205 BullTRP_RG204_SQD Livefire.PPTX

sections.MISSION: Bull Troop conducts Squad Live Fire Exercises (LFX) at GTA (Range 204) from 2-6 May 2022 IOT certify lethal Squads and train in preparation for Platoon Live Fire Exercises.
sections.PURPOSE: of this live fire is to build on SbS ‘22 certify Squads in preparation for Platoon Live Fire.
sections.SUSTAINMENT:
, Fires)
Validate Rifle Squads under Blank and Live Fire (day/night) conditions
Challenge Squad Leader synchronization of AT and vehicle lethality
Platoon Leaders issue PLT OPORD, Squad Leaders issue SQD OPORD
Training Objectives:
Issue an Operations Order
React to Contact as a Squad
Conduct a Squad Attack
Conduct CASEVAC
Call For Fire
Send a SPOTREP
Conduct Field Maintenance
Timeline
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
CLI: Training Population will bring Food/Water
CLIII: Training population will top off before SP from Rose Barracks
CLIV: Pallets, Tarps, 1 strand C-Wire Needed
CLV: 700 Shotgun (85 Shooters), 10,000 9mm (300 iterations plus 10% alibi); Drop off 1 at 110800APR22 and Pick Up 121900APR22; Drop off 2 at 190800APR22 and Pick Up 201900APR22
Misc: 2x Fire extinguishers needed (coordinating with DISTRO)
